segments.text: I'm looking at the scene, and my heart feels a little heavy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so close to slipping in that spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see the moment she'll lose her balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy on that stool, it's just a matter of time before it topples.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on those cookies, he doesn't seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to think about the injuries that could result from this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A broken plate, a bump on the head, or even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocent play of the children is shadowed by real risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a tragedy waiting to happen, unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small, unnoticed details are converging into a potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I genuinely hope everyone emerges unscathed from this chaotic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
